abstract: Virginia Delegate Joseph D Morrissey, who was re-elected despite having been jailed for sex charges involving a teenager, is indicted on four new felony charges related to the scandal, including forgery.
lead_paragraph: A Virginia lawmaker who was just re-elected despite being jailed for a sex scandal with a teenager has been indicted on four new felony charges.
snippet: A Virginia lawmaker who was just re-elected despite being jailed for a sex scandal with a teenager has been indicted on four new felony charges.
